events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The issue has been classified as a Refund case following the customer's request for returning the jacket.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent to handle the refund request for the jacket.
Hello! I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to assist you with this process.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the return so we can process your refund promptly?
My order number is 123456789. I want to return the jacket because it’s too large and doesn’t fit well.
Thank you for the details. We will email you a prepaid return label to send the jacket back, and once received, we will issue your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid return label for making this easier.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
